                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Given a map, convert the map into a bean, where the map's key values are the same as the beans properties.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the bean, the bean will be created by this method.
        map - the map whose properties are to be converted to a bean
        Returns:
        the map of the beans properties
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - failed to allocate object if class

      • importTable

        public static final void importTable(DatabaseInterface dao,
                                     com.viper.database.model.Database database)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the dao interface, and the model of the database, transfer the data in the database object to the database.
        Parameters:
        dao - the object for read/writing to/from the database.
        database - the in memory database object containing the cached data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the transfer to database failed, failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc.

      • importTableAsCSV

        public static final <T> void importTableAsCSV(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                              DatabaseInterface dao,
                                              java.lang.String filename)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the dao interface, and the model of the database, transfer the data from the CSV file to the database.
        Parameters:
        dao - the object for read/writing to/from the database.
        clazz - the class of the bean matching the CSV data, should contain database annotations.
        filename - the filename of the location of the CSV data to import
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the transfer to database failed, failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc.

      • exportTableAsCSV

        public static final <T> void exportTableAsCSV(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                              DatabaseSQLInterface dao,
                                              java.lang.String filename)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the dao interface, read the data corresponding to the class object, and write to a file in the outdir directory.
        Parameters:
        dao - the object for read/writing to/from the database.
        clazz - the class of the bean matching the CSV data, should contain database annotations.
        filename - the filename which will contain the CSV formatted data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the transfer from database failed, failure to get table data, no database, no table, bad connection, etc. Or the transfer to file failed.

      • writeConnections

        public static final void writeConnections(java.lang.String filename,
                                          com.viper.database.model.DatabaseConnections dbcs)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the list of connections, write the contents as xml to te specified filename.
        Parameters:
        dbcs - the connections object, should contain XML annotations.
        filename - the disk file where the connections are to be written as XML file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The transfer to file failed. File access problem or JAXB conversion to XML issue.

      • readConnections

                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        filename - the file of XML data contain the connection data.
        Returns:
        the object containing the database connection information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The transfer from file failed. File access problem or JAXB conversion issue.

      • write

        public static final <T> void write(java.lang.String filename,
                                   T item,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the filename and the bean class, store the file from the serialized bean (XML).
        Parameters:
        filename - the file where bean data is to be written.
        item - the bean, the bean will be serialized and written to file.
        properties - a map of properties for the JAXB serialization.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The transfer from file failed. File access problem or JAXB conversion issue.
